title: I can't logging on to my account :(
body:
I try to access my account for more than 15 days, but was kept in the login screen and I don't get any error message
I try to delete a launcher file and  the patch and reinstall it remained the same problem
I turned off antivirus  and firewall vain
I try to login with another account and worked Repair of the game and the same problem
Prepared installing Windows again to no avail
I hope that one can help me I'm tired  :(

replies.body: It seems that your network is unable to establish a connection with our server.  For your specific issue, hit up our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can take a closer look and find out what's going wrong.  Thanks for your patience!
